医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型生物传感器可以快速且廉价地识别有骨质疏松症风险的人随着全球预期寿命的延长，骨质疏松症等与年龄相关的疾病的影响也越来越大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-biosensor-could-quickly-and-inexpively-identify-people-at-risk-for-osteoporosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-biosensor-could-quickly-and-inexpively-identify-people-at-risk-for-osteoporosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cac34516-c65b-4d85-8121-57d567b96c65 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:56:55 -0400 New biosensor could quickly and inexpensively identify people at risk for osteoporosis
心脏康复与手术后数年死亡风险降低有关对于数百万接受心脏手术或经历心血管并发症（如心脏病发作或心力衰竭）的美国人来说，可能会鼓励他们参与心脏康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Cardiac-rehabilitation-linked-to-decreased-risk-of-death-years-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Cardiac-rehabilitation-linked-to-decreased-risk-of-death-years-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15a557bf-b8c7-457a-bc2d-2a5fb5f3dc36 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:50:00 -0400 Cardiac rehabilitation linked to decreased risk of death years after surgery
在初步体外测试中，浓缩咖啡化合物可抑制 tau 蛋白聚集无论是单独享用还是与拿铁、美式咖啡甚至马提尼混合享用，浓缩咖啡都能为咖啡爱好者提供超浓缩的咖啡因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Espresso-compounds-inhibit-tau- Protein-aggregation-in-preliminary-in-vitro-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Espresso-compounds-inhibit-tau- Protein-aggregation-in-preliminary-in-vitro-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58f666fc-eb79-48de-90e4-120735eca603 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:39:31 -0400 Espresso compounds inhibit tau protein aggregation in preliminary in vitro tests
老年人看到了认知筛查的好处，但许多人尚未经过测试一项针对 65 岁至 80 岁人群的新民意调查发现，80% 的老年人看到了测试的好处，这些测试可以提前警告一个人的记忆力和思维能力已经开始下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Older-adults-see-the-benefit-in-cognitive-screening-but-many-have-not-been-tested.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Older-adults-see-the-benefit-in-cognitive-screening-but-many-have-not-been-tested.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a907b7f8-a12d-40ac-8c2a-7138252fce64 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:25:24 -0400 Older adults see the benefit in cognitive screening, but many have not been tested
研究为治疗炎症性疾病开辟了新的可能性炎症反应对于保护性免疫是不可或缺的，但微生物病原体常常引发过度反应，即“细胞因子风暴”，对宿主有害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Research-opens-new-possibilities-for-treating-炎症-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Research-opens-new-possibilities-for-treating-炎症-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a43f5e6-9403-4931-8312-beee4aa1edb9 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:17:32 -0400 Research opens new possibilities for treating inflammatory diseases
研究人员将 β-蒎烯转化为可再生原料，生产可持续的扑热息痛和布洛芬研究人员开发了可扩展的工艺，将 β-蒎烯转化为 4-IPEC，这是合成可持续版本的扑热息痛和布洛芬的原料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Researchers-convert-ceb2-Pinene-into-renewable-feedstock-for-sustainable-paracetamol-and-ibuprofen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Researchers-convert-ceb2-Pinene-into-renewable-feedstock-for-sustainable-paracetamol-and-ibuprofen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c8535a0-098f-4a52-b7fe-8315e86ab674 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 09:11:00 -0400 Researchers convert β-Pinene into renewable feedstock for sustainable paracetamol and ibuprofen

研究发现β细胞功能受损与COVID-19引起的严重高血糖有关最近的一项研究旨在调查 COVID-19 幸存者在六个月的随访期间是否持续存在高血糖症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Study-finds-impaired-beta-cell-function-linked-with-severe-COVID-19-induced-hyperglycemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Study-finds-impaired-beta-cell-function-linked-with-severe-COVID-19-induced-hyperglycemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d5ba8c1-948d-4fc4-8a93-fe9c37c6fd90 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 08:47:00 -0400 Study finds impaired beta cell function associated with severe COVID-19-induced hyperglycemia
